entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:03 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kirkland Lake 03:00 AM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -6.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Wind Chill: -8
Wind: S 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 8:32 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 8:32 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 8:32 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
